page.title: 15Bridge Street Development
page.content: In 1985 Bridge Street in Darwen was made into a Pedestrian area.Before this happened it was a very busy,noisy,dangerous and narrow road.Lorries and cars used to park on the pavements and cause traffic jams.Bridge Street is very commercial with shops along both sides of the Street.Many shops mean lots of people,so it has been made into a pedestrian area for safety.It is now a much better area and looks a lot nicer with yellowy stones on the ground in a fancy pattern and old fashioned lamps and posts.the street has had alot of new shops like hairdressers and a computer shop since it has been altered.Another road was made to replace the road where the pedestrian area has been built.It seems much better as a Pedestrian area.
